nodes.text: Jano Bix was a male Twi'lek swoop gang leader operating out of Mos Eisley, Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, upon ordering four gorg combos from Tasty Dried Critters, the creatures attacked Bix. The spacer who delivered the order killed the gorgs and Jano Bix ate them anyway.

Jano Bix was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011.
